entity.name: independent_property_definition
entity.description: An independent_property_definition is a type of general_property and class that is an Independent_property_definition.

entity.name: point_property_definition
entity.description: An point_property_definition is a type of independent_property_definition that is a Point_property_definition.

entity.name: property_symmetry
entity.description: A property_symmetry is a type of general_property and class that is a Property_symmetry.

entity.name: property_symmetry_by_library_reference
entity.description: A property_symmetry is a general_property and an externally_defined_item that is a Property_symmetry_by_library_reference.

entity.name: range_property_definition
entity.description: A range_property_definition is a type of independent_property_definition that is a Range_property_definition.

entity.name: space_for_property_definition
entity.description: A space_for_property_definition is a type of general_property_relationship that is a Space_for_property_definition.

explicit.name: relating_property
explicit.description: the property_space that indicates the physical phenomenon.

explicit.name: related_property
explicit.description: an independent_property_definition that has the physical phenomenon indicated.

entity.name: standard_property_symmetry
entity.description: A standard_property_symmetry is a type of property_symmetry_by_library_reference that is a Standard_property_symmetry.

where.label: valid_standard_class
where.description: The supplier shall be 'ISO-TS-10303-1099', and the code shall be one of those listed in Table 1.

entity.name: symmetry_for_property_definition
entity.description: A symmetry_for_property_definition is a type of general_property_relationship that is a Symmetry_for_property_definition.

explicit.name: relating_property
explicit.description: the property_symmetry that indicates the symmetry.

explicit.name: related_property
explicit.description: an independent_property_definition that has the symmetry indicated.
